title: Geometrical Renormalization Groups: Perfect Deconstruction Actions
abstract: By combining two distinct renormalization group transformations, opposing scale transformations, we obtain a composite transformation which does not rescale the system, and drives it to a "geometrical" fixed point, controlling the effective geometry and locality. The latticized (deconstructed) action for an extra-dimensional field theory becomes a ``perfect action,'' with a linear ladder spectrum for N KK-modes.
